POV: Our Group celebrates its 70th anniversary!

Seven decades ago, the journey began from a small shop in Damascus, driven by a passion for craftsmanship and a dream of excellence. Today, we stand as a global luxury retail Group, shaped by the dedication of our people, the trust of our partners, and the loyalty of our customers.

At our annual Group Seminar this year, we didn’t just celebrate a milestone—we honoured our past, we applauded our present, and we looked ahead to a future we will create together in harmony, united by a shared purpose: to build a future where luxury dreams become reality.

Through inspiring conversations, visionary ideas, and the unwavering entrepreneurial spirit of three generations leading the way, we embraced what is next with hope, ambition, and a deep respect for our roots and legacy.

The journey continues, and the best is yet to come!

Retail Academy Launches OJT Programme

This February, the Retail Academy is bringing learning directly to our stores with the launch of the On-the-Job Training (OJT) Programme; a dynamic, hands-on initiative designed to elevate team performance through immersive, real-world learning.
Delivered in-store by our expert trainers, this programme focuses on guided roleplays, immediate feedback, and practical skill-building to ensure our retail store teams are equipped to deliver exceptional customer experiences.

Welcome to our new Joiners

Alejandro Ferrer Ramos joins our as a VP – Tech Solutions (Omnichannel), reporting directly to Kamran Abbasi. In his new role, he will collaborate with Business Technology partners and key stakeholders to support cross-functional transformation programs and key technology projects across our Group.
In his previous role, Alejandro served as Global Brands CIO for Estée Lauder Companies, responsible for defining the brands’ technology strategy, innovation, and investments. Prior to that, he held the position of Chief Innovation Officer at the Inditex Group, where he enhanced the customer experience across ZARA and other brands.
